page.shortlink: ux controlbar items disclosure settings margin right property
page.description: Defines the disclosure right margin. This setting is optional.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Margin - right]* property can be used to change the right margin for the disclosure. The *[ui:Margin - right]* is defined using CSS units. If no unit is specified, the value is assumed to be pixels. '%' is not supported.
